alert.note: Alert for Central Utah Mountains; Henry Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 17 at 3:40AM MDT until June 17 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 493 AND 494 BELOW 7500 FEET... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 493 Central Utah Mountains and Fire Weather Zone 494 Henry Mountains. * WINDS...South 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 11 percent. * THUNDERSTORMS...Isolated dry thunderstorms are possible Friday. Strong and erratic outflow winds are possible. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions will occur. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
